mapper.select: SELECT P.PLANNUM, P.PLANNAME, P.PLANPRICE, P.DATACAPACITY, P.CATEGORYCODE, P.PLANEXPLAIN, P.PLANEXPLAINS, D.DISPERCENT, P.DISABLED FROM PLAN P LEFT JOIN DISCODE D ON(P.DISCODE=D.DISCODE) WHERE PLANNUM LIKE 'G%' OR PLANNUM LIKE 'S%' OR PLANNUM LIKE 'T%' OR PLANNUM LIKE 'Z%' OR PLANNUM LIKE 'W%' OR PLANNUM LIKE 'H%'
SELECT DISTINCT C.NOTE FROM PLAN P INNER JOIN COMMONCODE C ON SUBSTRING(P.PLANNUM, 1, 1) = C.TYPE
SELECT * FROM PLAN WHERE NOT PLANNUM = #{planNum} ORDER BY PLANPRICE DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT CC.NOTE AS note FROM PLAN P LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE CC ON (P.CATEGORYCODE = CC.CODE) AND (CC.TYPE = SUBSTRING(#{planNum},1,1)) WHERE P.PLANNUM = #{planNum}
SELECT MEMBERNUM FROM MEMBER WHERE NAME=#{name} AND RRNF=#{rrnf} AND RRNL=#{rrnl}

SELECT P.PLANNUM, P.PLANNAME, P.PLANPRICE, P.DATACAPACITY, M.MEMBERNUM, T.SERIALNUM , T.PHONENUM, T.KINGCHECK FROM PLAN P JOIN TELEPHONE T ON T.PLANNUM = P.PLANNUM JOIN MEMBER M ON T.MEMBERNUM = M.MEMBERNUM WHERE M.MEMBERNUM = #{memberNum}
SELECT * FROM OTHERTELECOM WHERE TAPHONENUM = #{taPhoneNum} AND TELECOMNAME = #{telecomName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMONCODE (TYPE, CODE, VALUE, NOTE) VALUES(#{type}, #{code}, #{value}, #{note})

INSERT INTO PLAN (PLANNUM, DISCODE, PLANNAME, PLANPRICE, DATACAPACITY, CATEGORYCODE, PLANEXPLAIN, PLANEXPLAINS, DISABLED) VALUES(#{planNum},#{disCode}, #{planName}, #{planPrice}, #{dataCapacity}, #{categoryCode}, #{planExplain}, #{planExplainS}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAN SET DISCODE=#{disCode}, PLANNAME=#{planName}, PLANPRICE=#{planPrice}, DATACAPACITY=#{dataCapacity},CATEGORYCODE=#{categoryCode}, PLANEXPLAIN=#{planExplain}, PLANEXPLAINS=#{planExplainS}
mapper.select: SELECT EP.*, C.NOTE FROM EPLAN EP INNER JOIN COMMONCODE C ON SUBSTRING(EP.EXTRAPLANNUM, 1, 1) = C.TYPE AND SUBSTRING(EP.EXTRAPLANNUM, -2) = C.CODE
SELECT DISTINCT CC.NOTE AS note FROM EPLAN EP LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE CC ON (EP.CATEGORYCODE = CC.CODE) AND (CC.TYPE = SUBSTRING(#{extraPlanNum},1,1)) WHERE EP.EPLANNUM = #{extraPlanNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EPLAN (EXTRAPLANNUM, EXTRANAME, EXTRAPRICE, EXTRAPLANEXPLAIN, EXTRAPLANEXPLAINS, EXTRAPLANEXPLAINM, CATEGORYCODE) VALUES(#{extraPlanNum}, #{extraPlanName}, #{extraPrice}, #{categoryCode}, #{extraPlanExplain}, #{extraPlanExplainS}, #{extraPlanExplainM}, #{categoryCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE EPLAN SET NAME=#{extraPlanName}, EXTRAPRICE=#{extraPrice}, CATEGORYCODE=#{categoryCode}, EXTRAPLANEXPLAIN=#{extraPlanExplain}, EXTRAPLANEXPLAINS=#{extraPlanExplainS}, EXTRAPLANEXPLAINM=#{extraPlanExplainM}
